alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 09 at 4:05AM EST until November 09 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT... * WHAT...Moderate saltwater flooding. * WHERE...Upper Keys. * WHEN...Through late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is expected. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The relief during the neap tides over the next couple of days may not be enough to alleviate coastal flooding impacts across the Upper Keys, as higher amplitude tides will begin in a few days.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
